title: Too many mini uptades.
body:
The game updates everyday for always 25,8megabytes, but **nothing** changes.
What the heck is happening, is this a bug or what.

replies.body:
Sometimes there are small things we notice that could be updated or adjusted for better overall play. You can always find out what changed by scrolling through the patch notes in the client.

If your client keeps updating *everyday* that might be different story. Updating that often could be sign that maybe your firewalls are blocking certain files, so the client needs to try and update them again. I'd try turning off your firewall or adding exceptions with [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3), and try that update again.
